long_description: Simple construction and fabrication make the Copperhead Bike Mount one of Yakima's most affordable top-of-car bike mounts that doesn't touch the painted surface of your bike. Fork-style mount has a fork block and a wheel tray with micro-adjusting, ratcheting wheel strap that fits a wide range of tire sizes and designs. Locking, long-throw skewer offers 1-step adjustment, making it easy to load and unload bicycles. Fits round bars and square bars (sold separately). Corrosion-resistant, heavy-duty steel construction and injection-molded block design combine strength with beauty; hardware is hidden when mounted. The Yakima Copperhead Bike Mount has an SKS lockable skewer (lock cores sold separately).
short_description: Simple construction and fabrication make the Copperhead Bike Mount one of Yakima's most affordable top-of-car bike mounts that doesn't touch the painted surface of your bike.
